product_specification.Processor Type: A10X Fusion Chip with 64‑bit Architecture with Embedded M10 Coprocessor
product_specification.Additional Features: 4 Speaker Audio, ProMotion Technology, Video Calling: FaceTime Video - iPad to Any FaceTime Enabled Device, Audio Calling: FaceTime Audio - iPad to Any FaceTime Enabled Device, Digital Compass, Siri: Use Voice to Send Messages, Set Reminders, and More, Accessibility: AssistiveTouch, Switch Control, Magnifier, Built-in Apps: iTunes Store, iCloud Drive, App Store, iBooks, Photo Booth, Podcasts, Find My iPhone, Find My Friends, iTunes Remote, iMovie
product_specification.Sales Package: iPad Pro, Lightning to USB Cable, USB Power Adapter
product_specification.Sensors: Touch ID, Three‐axis Gyro, Accelerometer, Barometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Rear Camera: Optical Image Stabilization, Six‑element Lens, Panorama, Sapphire Crystal Lens Cover, Backside Illumination Sensor, Hybrid IR Filter, Autofocus with Focus Pixels, Live Photos with Stabilization, Body and Face Detection, Exposure Control, Noise Reduction, Auto HDR for Photos, Burst Mode, Timer Mode, Photo Geotagging, Front Camera: 1080p HD Video Recording, Retina Flash, Auto HDR, Body and Face Detection, Auto Image Stabilization, Burst Mode, Exposure Control, Timer Mode, Video Recording: Cinematic Video Stabilization, Video Geotagging, Noise Reduction, Continuous Autofocus Video
product_specification.Other Display Features: QHD LED Backlit Multi-touch Display, Wide Color Display, True Tone Display, Fully Laminated Display, Antireflective Coating, Fingerprint-resistant Oleophobic Coating
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Redesigned Retina Display: The iPad Pro's 26.67 cm (10.5) touchscreen offers you enough canvas to work on, to read texts or to watch movies without straining your eyes. All iPads offer users a great multi-touch experience, but the iPad Pro's redesigned Retina display sets a whole new standard. This iPad's display is brighter and more responsive than ever. It is also less reflective than regular tablets. Everything feels smooth, fast, and immersive on the iPad Pro. The iPad's fingerprint-resistant oleophobic coating protects it from smudges.
product_description.Endless Fun: This iPad supports various software that make both work and play fun. Apps like Adobe Photoshop Lightroom lets you make professional-level adjustments to your photos on the go with a simple tap and swipe gesture. The iPad Pro also includes features like Great Big Story which lets you watch a curated playlist of the best videos from around the world, the Star Walk 2 which brings you lifelike images of stars, planets, and comets, and Houzz which lets you use the Apple Pencil to write and draw on high-resolution home renovation images.
product_description.Incredible Refresh Rate: The iPad Pro's Retina display supports a refresh rate of 120 Hz so the videos you watch on it look spectacular, while video games run smoothly without any distracting artifacts. The iPad Pro intuitively responds to commands regardless of whether you use the display with your finger or the Apple Pencil.
product_description.See More, Feel More: Immerse yourself in the videos you watch on your iPad Pro because the iPad's 600 nits of brightness enhances its lighting so you can clearly view content on your iPad. This iPad's wide P3 color gamut brings you more vibrant greens and reds so images and videos are truer to life. Apple's custom-designed anti-reflective coating makes this iPad Pro's display clear and readable.
product_description.Seamless Multitasking: When updated with the iOS 11, the iPad Pro's all-new Dock makes it easy to open your favourite and recently used files and apps. Use the Slide Over or Split View apps if you want to stay active or work on two apps simultaneously.
product_description.Powerful Performance: Powered by the A10X Fusion chip which has a 64-bit architecture and six cores, the iPad Pro is packed with incredible power. You can edit 4K videos, or use uMake to create elaborate 3D drawings or models and export them as industry-style formats. The iPad Pro also has the AudioDesk Format which lets you capture building design concepts digitally, anywhere you are. The Bloomberg Professional app lets you view real-time data, charts, graphs, and more such documents when you multitask. Apple's ISP (Image Signal Processing) uses machine learning to breathe life into your photos and videos so they look lifelike.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: The iPad Pro's long-lasting battery ensures up to 10 hours of performance. Take your iPad Pro with you and work on the go.
product_description.Responsive Apple Pencil: This iPad's pencil boasts an increased refresh rate which makes it feel responsive and natural. Use this pen to write notes, sign documents, annotate on PDFs, or to draw on screenshots with ease. The Apple pen also lets you sketch and draw with pixel-perfect precision. It also includes the searchable handwriting feature which lets you search for handwritten texts and characters.
product_description.Files App: The Files app brings all the files on your iPad, your apps, in your iCloud, and also the files across other services like Dropbox and Box together. This iPad has an expansive 64 GB ROM for you to save your media files in.
product_description.Drag and Drop: Drag and Drop lets you move texts, photos, and files from one app to another with just a finger swipe. The iPad Pro also includes the App Switcher which lets you smoothly switch from one app to another. This function even remembers the combinations of apps you've multi-tasked with previously.
product_description.Sleek and Compact Design: The Apple iPad Pro packs a credible performance, an advanced display, two cameras, ultrafast wireless connectivity, and a powerful battery. All this goodness is packed into a neat and compact device that is the iPad Pro. Its sleek and compact design means you can carry your iPad around with you and work on the go.
product_description.Wireless Connectivity: Stream videos or browse the Internet at your leisure, the iPad Pro's Wi-Fi connectivity offers you the world in your hands.
product_description.Cameras: The iPad Pro features the same cameras as the iPhone 7. The 12 MP rear and 7 MP front cameras in the Apple iPad Pro have an advanced optical image stabilization function and a ratio of f/1.8 which allow you to click picture-perfect photos and videos even in low-light conditions. The iPad's wide color capture feature helps you click the perfect Instagram-worthy selfies.
product_description.Touch ID: The Touch ID feature uses an advanced fingerprint sensor that lets you unlock your iPad almost instantly. This ID also lets you secure private data in apps, or make purchases with Apple Play within apps and on the Web.
product_description.Convenience at Your Fingertips: Keep your photo library and your edited images up to date on all your devices with the iCloud photo library. The iPad Pro also includes features like Handoff which lets you start a movie and pick up right where you left it. The Universal Clipboard lets you copy texts or videos from an app to your iPhone and paste them to your iPad. It's that simple and convenient. Want to share files between devices? The AirDrop lets you transfer files wirelessly. The iPad Pro works with your iPhone, your Mac laptop, and your Apple Watch.

review:
First of All Thanks Flipkart for such a Wonderful price for a Beast Like This. This is my first Apple product. I must tell you the price I paid is complete justice. Every vertical has been completely justified by this. Speed, Display, Touch, Battery and specially sound is awesome. Viewing things on Laptop is always makes you feel good but on this it's awesome.

Overall it's worth every penny I paid. It's on 2017 but still fails every model of 2018. Just Go For It !!

I have used iPad before but this one is classy and crisp. Thank you Flipkart for the earlier than expected delivery. The iPad Pro 10.5 is now in a super new level and the Apple pencil experience was out of this world.

product is Good but don't buy it if you really don't need it. after a week you really start realising that you don't need to but such a expensive tablet. any apple ipad costing around 25k can satisfy your tablet need..also windows users will never find its file saving method and opening method better than windows itself. Anyway Apple needs to simplify it's UI. they must take reference from windows for doing it like android. Apple pencil works fine on the pad.
Thanks.

Wow.. colour display (P3) is amazing. 120 Hz refresh rate is just amazing. You can never notice any lagging in this device. With apple pencil it is a beast which can defeat most of the laptops! I have bought the 64 gb Version along with the Sandisk Wifi Stick of 64 gb and the apple pencil in the Bigbillion days. I got it in 40K and the Sandisk Stick is 2.5K . It is a reasonable price. Why should I buy the 256 GB version spending about 20K money more.. I should suggest every student to go for the 64 GB storage.

Awesome!
It is my first apple device.
It's very much faster and stylish than a laptop. Camera is best in class. Love it.
Thanks Flipkart for fast delivery!

This thing is a BEAST!!! Display is awesome, never ever seen such a great display on a mobile device. As Powerful as it gets with the A10x fusion chip, 4gb ddr4 ram.

The best thing though, is the backing up of the hardware, through the software. IOS11 is a real big upgrade for the Ipad, and is a huge selling point from my point of view. It takes the Ipad way ahead of its competition with the split screen use, drag and drop feature, and much more.

The speakers will make you forget, all other audio devices, it's loud, clear, has a good bass. I would at least hear one song for the sake of listening to those speakers.

The cameras too. This ipad has got the iphone 7 camera, and I can't believe, apple gave those cameras on an Ipad. It's just awesome.

Gaming experience in this Ipad with the pro motion display, or the 120hz display, is just future stuff, at present. No other tablets are even nearby. Games look super smooth with yhe high frame rates, and you will never want to play games on other mobile devices.

Lastly, this Ipad has no competition, and is in the league of it's own. Kudos to apple ✌️



Lastly,

Very satisfied with the product. I have combined the Apple pencil and Apple keyboard to enhance my experience. It is almost a touchscreen laptop and I am still exploring as to how I can increase my productivity. It's sound is of great quality with four speakers.

This ipad pro is the best one by far up until now even after the newer iPad pro 2018 has been launched. This one has the A10X which is lightning fast. You can render huge 4k files and raw files on it on the go. The camera is the best in any tablet so far and yes that is including the iPad pro 2018 coz the latter doesn't have OIS. And since this is a tablet which makes it a media consumption device let's talk about the things that matter if you are a media junkie just like me. The battery life is just insane. iOS is so good that the standby battery drain overnight (around 8-10 hours) is just 1% for me. The speakers are the best on any tablet by far (the 2018 ipad pro I'm hoping will be a bit better although I don't know how Apple could improve upon the already kickass speakers). The speakers are so good that it is better than most laptops out there. Finally, the screen is just so mesmerizing. The day I got it and even now I find myself lost in that beautiful retina 120 Hz screen. The colors pop out and the iPad can get extremely bright. And now probably the best thing about it is that it will continue to have support for another 4 years thanks to Apple. Overall, it has been a great purchase and a wonderful experience.

Its been around a month, using iPad 10.5 pro bought at 37.5k and working absolutely fantastic.

Cons

Overall it is good n decent product which can handle your personal n professional work together. Best in range n blindly go for it if you are looking for tablet as durability, accessibility and better performance than any other gadget

This iPad has been my first apple product. While I was certain that I needed an iPad for my browsing requirements at home and also whilst at travel, I was not sure which model to go for. After a lot of research, I zeroed in on 10.5 iPad Pro. My reasons for selecting this model are as follows:

> better display than the 9 inch version
> smooth operation and really fast
> the specs are latest so will not get slow with iterations in iOS
> Ideal size for a non professional use compared to a 12 inch model

I have been using the tablet for about a month and the only minus that I notice is that it is a very good fingerprint magnet. Excellent device to browse, read and play games. Feels premium. iOS 11 update has bumped up the experience significantly. The best tablet around if you are interested in one.

Finally, kudos to Flipkart for the excellent delivery. The entire purchasing experience was quick and extremely satisfying.

Thank you.
